rooms.description: Large entrance hall with Vastu-optimized alignment to the east for auspicious entry.
Open-plan living area adjoining kitchen; designed with ample natural light and views towards the garden.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area for efficient space utilization.
Dedicated dining space adjacent to the living room, facilitating family gatherings.
Two-car garage with direct access from the entrance, designed for convenience and security.
Space allocated for household utilities and storage.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east following Vastu guidelines, ensuring positive energy flow.
Large window in the living room providing natural light and ventilation.

vastu_considerations: Main entrance aligned east to welcome positive energies.
Service area located north for better utility flow.
Balconies planned on upper floor are designed with privacy in mind.
additional_notes.joint_family_adaptability: Layout accommodates common areas for joint family living with flexible spaces.
